name: Decrafted
description:
DECRAFTED is a crafting game where the objective is to have *only one* (get it @GMTK game jam xdr) item at the end. You can combine two items to make one further item, destroying the two previous items in the process.

Experiment to find out what series of items need to be created or destroyed in order to leave the world perfectly balanced, as everything should be.

If you didn't hate this (and I know you possibly might) follow @HariusAwesome on twitter for more epic fortnite funnies

Click here to view the walkthrough

(This game exists mostly as a proof of concept or a premise for a game, but I think it's still a decent waste of five minutes in and of itself)
